actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to extend permanently the Federal tax refund offset program used in child support enforcement.
short_title: Child Support Enforcement Extension Act of 1989

summary.text: Child Support Enforcement Extension Act of 1989 - Amends part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to extend permanently the program of withholding past-due support from Federal tax refunds.

titles.title: Child Support Enforcement Extension Act of 1989
To amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to extend permanently the Federal tax refund offset program used in child support enforcement.
